japanese:
こんなに広いと、施設と施設に
移動するだけでも疲れちゃいそうだね。
translation:
With a park this big,
just moving from one facility to another
seems tiring, doesn't it.

japanese: お！　そんならいはちゃんに朗報だ！
translation: Oh! then I have good news for you, Raiha-chan!

japanese:
電気遊覧車っていうのがあるみたいだよ。
公園内をぐるぐる回ってる乗り物。
translation:
There seems to be something called
an electric tour bus, a vehicle
that circles around the park.

japanese:
えっ！
なになに？　気になる！
translation:
Wha?!
What's that? I'm curious!

japanese: なにを話してるんだ、２人で。
translation: What are you two talking about?

japanese: あ、お兄ちゃん。
translation: Ah, hey, big bro.

japanese:
公園の広さに感心してたとこ。
で、そんな広い園内を
電気自動車が走り回ってるみたいなんだ。
translation:
Not only is the size of the park impressive,
but there's also an electric powered vehicle
completely circling around it.

japanese:
そんなものがあるのか。
まあ、この広さだと必要だろうな。
translation:
Oh, is that so?
Well, I guess it's necessary considering the size of the park.

japanese:
パンフレットに案内があるよ。
バス停みたいに、止まるところは決まってるみたい。
translation:
There's a guide in the brochure.
It seems to stop at designated places, like a bus stop.

japanese: これに乗って公園をぐるぐるするのも楽しそう。
translation:
Riding this and going around the park
sounds fun too.

japanese:
端から端まで歩くと３０分以上かかりそうだが、
これはどのくらいの速度で走るんだろうな。
translation:
It would take more than a half hour
to walk from one end to the other.
So, I wonder how fast the tour bus goes?

japanese:
そのくらいなら、恋人と手を繋いで
歩いていればあっという間じゃない？
フータロー君は乗る必要なさそう。
translation: Futaro-kun and Miku, you guys should hold hands and walk together instead of taking the tour bus.

japanese: ……急に話を振ってきたな。
translation: ...Why are you suddenly changing the topic?

japanese:
だって、ここで勝負かけるつもりなんでしょ？
三玖に。
translation:
Well, you're intending to put everything on the line today,
right?
For Miku.

japanese: まあ、そんな感じだ。
translation: Yeah, something like that.

japanese:
やっぱりそうなんだ。
頑張れ、お兄ちゃん！
translation:
I figured as much.
Good luck, big bro!

japanese:
一花。
その……さっきは助かった。
translation:
Ichika.
Um... Thanks for earlier.

japanese:
私はなにもしてないよ？
思ったことを言っただけ。
translation:
I didn't do anything, did I?
I just said what I was thinking.

japanese:
いや、お前のアシストのおかげでここに来れたんだ。
それなりの結果を出すつもりだ。
translation:
No, thanks to what you said earlier,
I was able to come up with this plan.
I'm going to try to get some decent results.

japanese:
ふふっ！
その言い方、君らしいなぁ。
translation:
Teehee!
That's something you would definitely say.

japanese: は？　なんか変か？
translation: Huh? Did I say something wrong?

japanese:
だって、『それなりの結果を出す』なんてさ。
テストじゃないんだよ？
translation:
Well, you said you're going to achieve 'some decent results.'
But, it's not a test, you know?

japanese: お兄ちゃんは本当にテストが好きなんだから。
translation: Big bro really likes tests, quite literally.

japanese:
まあ、強いて言わせてもらうなら、
それなりじゃなくて最高の結果を見せてほしいかな。
translation: Well, if I'm going through with it, I want to show the best result.

japanese:
ここから帰る時、
君と三玖が手を繋いでいても見逃してあげよう！
translation:
When we're leaving this place,
If I see you two holding hands, I'll leave you two to it!

japanese: そ、そんなことしねぇよ！
translation: W-we won't be holding hands!

japanese: え、そこで赤くなるの？
translation: What, you're blushing at this?

japanese:
君、もうすぐ大学生だよ？
もしかして中身は小学生レベルだったりする？
translation: You're almost a college student, right? Or are you still a child?

japanese: お兄ちゃん、からかわれるの苦手だもん。
translation: Big bro doesn't like being teased.

japanese:
じゃなくてだな！
人前でって意味だ！
translation:
It's not like that!
I just don't like to do it in front of other people!

japanese:
……その、俺の都合で
お前らを振り回しちまって悪いと思ってる。
translation:
...The thing is,
I feel bad for putting you guys through all this trouble,
for my own selfish desire.

japanese:
そこは気にしないの。
ここには明後日くる予定だったし、
順番が入れ変わっただけだよ。
translation:
Don't worry about it.
We were supposed to come here the day after tomorrow
anyway, so it's just a change of schedule.

japanese:
三玖が許してくれるならな。
あいつの気持ちを優先したいんだよ。
translation:
If Miku doesn't mind, that is.
I'd like to prioritize her feelings.

japanese: 三玖の気持ちか。
translation: Miku's feelings, huh.

japanese:
フータロー君は、
三玖が強い子だっていうのはよく知ってるよね？
translation:
Futaro-kun,
you know that Miku is a strong girl, right?

japanese: もちろんだ。
translation: Of course.

japanese: （だからこそ俺は三玖のことが……）
translation: (That's why I like Miku...)

japanese: うん、ちゃんとそう言えるのなら問題ないね。
translation:
Yeah, there shouldn't be any problem
if you manage to tell her how you feel properly.

japanese:
……その、俺の都合で
お前らを振り回しちまって悪いと思ってる。
translation:
...The thing is, I feel bad for putting you guys through all this trouble,
for my own selfish desire.

japanese:
そこは気にしないの。
ここには明後日くる予定だったし、
順番が入れ変わっただけだよ。
translation:
Don't worry about it.
We were supposed to come here the day after tomorrow
anyway, so it's just a change of schedule.

japanese: そいつは助かる。
translation: That'll be of a big help.

japanese:
おおっと？
自信ありそうな顔してるね。
本当に手を繋いで帰れそうなの？
translation:
Oh? You look pretty confident.
Do you really think you can manage to
hold hands with her before it's time to leave?

japanese:
わからんが……
そのくらいのつもりで行かねぇと
三玖に届かないだろ？
translation:
I don't know...
but if I don't try,
I won't be able to convey my feelings to Miku, right?

japanese:
そっか。
まあ、君がやる時はやるタイプなのは知ってるし、
大丈夫だろうとは思ってる。
translation:
I see. Well, I know you're the type to do it
when the time comes, so I'm sure it'll be okay.

japanese:
……その、俺の都合で
お前らを振り回しちまって悪いと思ってる。
translation:
...The thing is, I feel bad for putting you guys through all this trouble,
for my own selfish desire.

japanese:
そこは気にしないの。
ここには明後日くる予定だったし、
順番が入れ変わっただけだよ。
translation:
Don't worry about it.
We were supposed to come here the day after tomorrow
anyway, so it's just a change of schedule.

japanese:
そうか。
本当にありがとな。
translation: I see. Thanks a bunch.

japanese:
もう。
君は変なところで気を遣うよね。
translation:
Oh, c'mon.
You're worrying too much.

japanese:
変なところじゃないだろ。
俺たちの問題に、お前らを巻き込んだんだ。
translation:
Of course I'll worry.
We involved you guys in our problem.

japanese:
それが変だって言ってるの。
巻き込まれてるなんて思ってませーん。
translation:
What are you saying.
We don't believe you've gotten us involved in anything.

japanese:
三玖やフータロー君の問題は、
私たち全員の問題なんだから。
translation: You guys' problem is our problem.

japanese: みんなで楽しく旅行しなきゃ！
translation: We're all gonna enjoy this trip together!

japanese:
そういうこと。
他のみんなだってそう思ってるよ。
translation: That's right. We all think the same way.

japanese: ……そうか。
translation: ...I see.

japanese:
（本当に、俺と三玖は、
　こいつらが見守ってくれてるからこそ
　ここまで来られたんだろう）
translation:
(It's all thanks to these guys watching over us,
 that we've been able to make it this far.)

japanese:
あのね、フータロー君。
ホントのこと言うと、
私、ちょっと反省してたんだよ。
translation:
Hey, Futaro-kun.
If I'm being honest,
I'm feeling a little regretful about something.

japanese: 反省？　なにを？
translation: Regretful? About what?

japanese: ホテルでさ、私、期待してるって言ったでしょ。
translation: At the hotel, I pressured you by saying I'm counting on you.

japanese:
君への応援のつもりだったけど、
逆にプレッシャーになってたら申し訳ないなって。
translation:
I said it as a means to encourage you,
but I'm sorry if I pressured you by accident.

japanese:
プレッシャー？
なんだそれは。
普通に応援と受け取ったし、普通に励まされたぞ。
translation:
Pressure?
What are you talking about?
I took it as an encouragement. It actually motivated me.

japanese:
……あー、そっか。
君はそういう人だよね。
translation: ...Ahh, is that so. Oh, you're such a dork.

japanese: お前こそ変なところで気にしすぎだろ。
translation:
You're the one
who worries too much.

japanese: しまった、反撃されちゃった。
translation: Touche!
